post.content:
Title        Java Developer, Online Channel
Category        Information Technology
City        Mississauga, Ontario, Canada
A French version is available upon request.

TDBFG Description
TD Bank Financial Group is the seventh largest bank in North America by branches and serves approximately 17 million customers. Ranked among the world’s leading on-line financial services firms, our 74,000 employees around the world offer and support a full range of financial products and services through:
•        Canadian Personal and Commercial Banking
•        Wealth Management
•        Wholesale Banking
•        Insurance
•        U.S. Personal and Commercial Banking
•        Corporate Support Areas

We operate in a number of locations in key financial centres around the globe.

Department Overview
An exciting opportunity exists to join the Online Channel support team within TDCT Technology Solutions as a Java Developer. This team provides day-to-day technical support and project delivery for the support of TD Canada Trust’s Online Channel applications (including: EasyWeb, Web Business Banking, Bill payments, tdcanadatrust.com and Wireless banking). This position will provide support on Project 49 eb Funds Transfer Service.

This position is located at our Mississauga, Ontario location.

The department is currently comprised of over 50 talented individuals (developers, IT specialists, test Analysts, business analysts, and IT managers) all working together to deliver a wide variety of interesting customer facing initiatives.

Job Description
Key accountabilities are:
•        Conduct program/system research, analysis, and problem resolution.
•        Test and debug according to test plans, using available/appropriate tools.
•        Develop, implement, maintain and improve solutions/processes that maximize system availability, efficiency/effectiveness and minimize/prevent problems/issues.
•        Comply with the system development life cycle (SDLC) in the completion of SDS documentation.
•        Support applications in production, including monitoring application state of health, root cause analysis and impact analysis.
•        Participate in on-call support rotation.
•        Participate in knowledge transfer with the team and business units.

Job Requirements
•        University or college or equivalent work experience.
•        5+ years of experience using JAVA, J2EE, Object Oriented design and related technologies.
•        5+ years of experience working with J2EE server projects including the use of JSP, Servlets, EJB.
•        Solid knowledge of UML and design patterns, OO programming best practices.
•        Experience working with XML, XSLT.
•        Knowledge of the software development life cycle (SDLC) and associated documentation requirements.
•        Ability to understand and acquire new technical skills.
•        Ability to code, debug and trouble-shoot.
•        Strong verbal and written communication skills.
•        Strong documentation skills.

Additional Information
TD Bank Financial Group values and is committed to diversity in its workforce.
We thank all applicants for their interest in this position, however, only qualified candidates will be contacted for an interview.
Skills:
EJB (Enterprise JavaBeans)
J2EE (Java 2 Enterprise Edition)
JAVA
JSP (Java Server Page)
Object Oriented
SDLC
XML
XSLT (stylesheets)
post.title: Java Developer, Online Channel-TD Bank Financial
